title: Daniel Satinsky DC - Chiropractor in Buffalo Grove, IL
description: Daniel Satinsky DC is your local Chiropractor in Buffalo Grove serving all of your needs. Call us today at (847)-227-8427 for an appointment.
cleaned_text: Welcome to Third Coast Chiropractic Your North Shore Chiropractor Call us at 847-227-8427 today. For more information or to schedule an appointment with our Buffalo Grove chiropractor, call 847-227-8427 today! Dr. Daniel Satinsky is a chiropractor serving Buffalo Grove and the surrounding North Shore area. Our chiropractor and the rest of the welcoming team at Third Coast Chiropractic are committed to providing chiropractic solutions to address your unique needs, whether you are experiencing back pain, neck pain, headaches, or even muscular tightness and tension. You may be searching for pain relief after an accident, experiencing an injury, or if you suffer from a specific condition like chronic back pain or a spinal condition. Even if you looking to improve your overall health, our chiropractor can help you attain your everyday wellness goals! Visit our testimonials page to find out what our patients are saying about our Buffalo Grove chiropractor and our chiropractic care plans. At your first visit to Third Coast Chiropractic, Dr. Daniel Satinsky will explain how chiropractic care works and give you a full evaluation to see if our chiropractic solutions are a good fit to address your needs. If there is a good fit, we can customize a plan of chiropractic care for your condition and health goals. If you have not been to a chiropractor before and want to find out more, please [email us](/contact) or call 847-227-8427 to receive the answers to your questions from our experienced team. We also welcome referrals, so we invite you to share our chiropractic and wellness information with your friends and loved ones. If you would like to stay informed about the latest in chiropractic care or if you want to start receiving free articles about health and wellness news, subscribe to our bi-weekly newsletter, even if you are not a patient. We also offer a community content area, which includes wellness articles and other healthcare resources. Dr. Daniel Satinsky Chiropractor | Third Coast Chiropractic | 847-227-8427 1618 Barclay Blvd Buffalo
